For example, I book a trade at a profit of around 12000 using their exit button, the executed amount would be 10000. There have been times when booked a profit of more than 2000 still the executed profit was not only less but in loss -749. This is higly disappointing. Now I'm looking for a new broker app. Too much Fraud app. I have lost 20000 rupees on this app. Hence

text: It has been more than one week, but Groww customer support has provided no solution. Their support quality is extremely poor, slow, and unhelpful. I have been repeatedly contacting them, but every time I receive only generic replies without any actual resolution. Very disappointing and disgusting experience. A financial app handling people's money cannot operate with such careless support and technical errors. I do not recommend Groww to anyone until they improve their service.

Otherwise, the app experience is good, but this issue needs to be fixed.

I will update my review after this bug is fixed in android.
